resources.string: Domoticz is a Home Automation System that lets you monitor and configure various devices like: Lights, Switches, various sensors/meters like Temperature, Rain, Wind, UV, Electra, Gas, Water and much more. Notifications/Alerts can be sent to any mobile device.
Swipe to the right or use the navigation buttons at the bottom to continue
The next page is for your Domoticz settings.\n\nPlease use the correct address and port settings.
